data.prayer: Spirit, please start new house churches in every neighborhood of the state of Khenchela.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the Lord as the waters cover the sea.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Khenchela, Algeria
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 386,404, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Khenchela, Algeria.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken the sleepers and call them to repent and be baptized in the state of Khenchela. Set an urgency in their hearts.
data.verse: And now why do you wait? Rise and be baptized and wash away your sins, calling on his name.’

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Belbali people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, help the stressed and anxious in Khenchela, Algeria know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Khenchela do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, convict the 264 believers in Khenchela to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

location.name: Khenchela
